text: (upbeat music)
- My name's Cindy

and I'm the Worldwide Head
of Solutions Architecture
for Microsoft Workloads.

One of the biggest surprises
when I came to AWS was
how much we empower our teams to innovate

and to actually change
what we do as a company.

We're unique in the way that
we truly are customer obsessed.
A lot of tech companies out there say
they're customer obsessed
but really focus a lot on the competition.

At AWS, we innovate on
behalf of our customers.
So 90% of what we build is based on input
directly from our customers.
A lot of people get to pursue

so many different career
trajectories here.

There's so many options of what
you can do once you're here

because we have a lot
of different businesses

and we're pretty globally
distributed as a company.

As we look at the way we
operate in a more global scale,
we need to kind of take a step back
and reflect on what are the biases

that we all bring coming
into every day at work.

Building a diverse team
is top of mind for AWS

and certainly top of mind
for me and our team here.

We work across a number
of different work streams

and initiatives to make AWS a
more inclusive place to work,

increase the diversity of
the people that we hire
and the people we're interviewing,
and make it so people can come to work

and just feel like they can
be themselves at their job.
